definition: any device that receives a signal or stimulus  and responds to it in a distinctive manner
details:
noun
- any device that receives a signal or stimulus and responds to it in a distinctive manner
= example: any device that receives a signal or stimulus and responds to it in a distinctive manner
= synonyms: sensor, sensing element
- electronic equipment that detects the presence of radio signals or radioactivity
- rectifier that extracts modulation from a radio carrier wave
= synonyms: demodulator
